Author: gdktsmgy12
Text: As someone with terrible impulse control, I can relate. All you can east situations, or situations where my meal is paid for so I can go ham, enable the absolute heck out my binge eating. I just saw some advice here that said getting up and going for a short walk in the evenings is a good way to break them up and maybe dissuade the urge to binge. Maybe that can help? Good luck!
